name: Acorn Ventures, Inc.
overview:
Acorn Ventures manages an investment fund and portfolio with broad coverage of emerging Internet, E-Commerce, Wireless Services and Software companies. Currently we are seeking investments for our $100,000,000 Acorn Ventures VI Fund in 2004. Acorn is affiliated with major Angel and Venture Capital Companies in Silicon Valley. This provides us with unique access to investment opportunities and venture capital relationships for emerging companies.

Acorn Ventures offers the emerging company a unique combination of skills and experience to support your company. Our principals have experience both as entrepreneurs and as corporate leaders. These skills and experiences assure you quality insight and leadership in addition to financial and management resources to help your company grow rapidly and manage that explosive growth. In partnership with your company, we try to create a synergy among companies in our portfolio with whom we are affiliated. The key to your success on the Internet is to partner. We will do our part to support your success.

Acorn Ventures is evaluating opportunities for our portfolio. Read a little about our company and which types of companies we are currently investing. Once you send us a copy of your plan. It usually takes us about 10 days to evaluate an opportunity and get back to you!
